title: Union param type stub is not recognized in 3.15 (including dev-master)
body:
This is from stubs I am making for [symfony/forms](https://github.com/strictify/psalm-plugin-symfony/tree/symfony-forms/src/Stubs/Forms).

---

#### The problem:

For a stub like this (removed irrelevant things):

```php
/**
 * @template T
 * @template-extends FormConfigInterface<T>
 */
interface FormConfigBuilderInterface extends FormConfigInterface
{
    /**
     * @psalm-param callable(PreSetDataEvent<T>)|callable(PreSubmitEvent<T>)|callable(SubmitEvent<T>) $listener
     */
    public function addEventListener($eventName, $listener, $priority = 0);
}
```

version 3.14.2 correctly finds the problem:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1964158/92302842-b8429100-ef6f-11ea-90f1-c9c49a688304.png)

Psalm also knows that ``T`` is instance of ``?Campaign``.  It is very important; [based on name](https://symfony.com/doc/current/form/events.html#a-the-formevents-pre-set-data-event), symfony will send different child of ``FormEvent``, and each child has different data.

---

But in version 3.15, psalm cannot recognize this stub and throws errors like this:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1964158/92302934-9a296080-ef70-11ea-92f2-a4aa2988f433.png)

All events fails so I had to revert. I checked changelog, can't see anything that could be the problem.

---

Am I doing something wrong or this is really a bug? Not sure how I can put a reproducer on psalm.dev (due to so many files needed) so some simple repository would probably be better.
